term.title: microelectrophoresis

item.text: The electrophoresis technique involving the movement of a mass of particles on a small scale (e.g. paper electrophoresis).

sources.item: PAC, 1972, 31, 577. 'Manual of Symbols and Terminology for Physicochemical Quantities and Units, Appendix II: Definitions, Terminology and Symbols in Colloid and Surface Chemistry' on page 620 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197231040577)

term.citation: Citation: 'microelectrophoresis' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.M03900

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
